description:
As Ichigo and his friends try to fight off Ho and Ban, the two Bounts, Udagawa tries to persuade Yoshino, a renegade bount, to return to Master Kariya`s fold.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ba Un to Shuuketsu! Ugokidasu Otoko
Gathering at the Place of Fortune! The Man who makes his Move
Rassemblement à la Place de Fortune ! L`homme qui fait son mouvement !
場運と集結! 動き出す男
